meta.fuzzyActivity
Class FuzzyActivityDomain

java.lang.Object
  framework.Constraint
      framework.meta.MetaConstraint
          meta.fuzzyActivity.FuzzyActivityDomain
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
public class FuzzyActivityDomain
extends MetaConstraint

Implements the MetaConstraint for fuzzy context recognition. Variable of the the meta-CSP are rules in a so-called "domain" (this class), and values are unifications of the requirements prescribed by these rules with existing FuzzyActivity variables.

Author:
Federico Pecora
See Also:
Serialized Form

isEquivalent

public boolean isEquivalent(Constraint c)
Description copied from class: Constraint
Method for assessing the "equivalence" between two constraints. This is not used for lookups nor comparisons (hence, it is not the equals method).

Specified by:
isEquivalent in class Constraint
Parameters:
c - The Constraint to compare against.
Returns:
true iff the two constraints are considered to be equivalent.
